title: The Marriage Deal
description: Jago was the only possible solution.Ashley Landon was desperate. After two years of her best efforts as chairman, her family's business faced either bankruptcy or a takeover. Then Jago Marrick, her ex-fiance, turned up with a hardheaded alternative--marriage.Ashley's first reaction was shock, but Jago seemed to be the company's only hope. As her husband and the new chairman, Jago's vast business experience could put Landons back on its feet.Reluctantly Ashley accepted--only to find that he wanted much more from their marriage than she was prepared to give.
author: Sara Craven
